title: Updates on Flash Token Bar
content:
Version 1.13.2:

  • Compatibility with Midi-QoL Previously, you were recommended to not use the setting that sends roll requests from character sheets with Midi-QoL. Now, this setting should also work fine with Midi, so you can send requests to players for attack, damage and spell rolls.

If you like this module, consider supporting me on Patreon.

Join the discussion on Discord or visit the Github repository.
